title: 3.2 Master Challenge 2
question:
Write a program to find the largest and smallest number and place their difference in the center (middle) of the List.
Numberlist: [5, 8, 13, 2, 6, 9]
Output: [5, 8, 13, 11, 2, 6, 9]
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
